title: Elevator, Additional storage, Soaking tub, Swimming pool
posting_body: ['We are currently offering virtual tours.', 'Please use the link in this ad to visit our website and set up a tour today or give us a call!', 'Welcome to Charles River Landing', 'Call Now - (781) 676-3171 x 3', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 1120 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Charles River Landing boasts remarkable amenities and luxury apartments in Needham, Massachusetts.', 'Take advantage of private courtyards with resort-style pool and outdoor fireplace, controlled-access private garage, fitness center, and HDTV sports lounge complete with billiards.', 'Now offering furnished and unfurnished apartments, these Needham apartments feature spacious master suites with oversized closets, hardwood and travertine flooring, high ceilings, full-sized washer/dryer, and a gourmet kitchen complete with granite countertops and stainless steel appliances.', 'Enjoy stylish details, high ceilings, and custom color accent walls in addition to premier resident services.', 'Located on the bank of the Charles River in the New England Business Center, Charles River Landing boasts an ideal location with easy access to the scenic waterfront as well as I-95 and the Mass Pike.', 'We are currently offering self-guided tours.', 'Features:', 'Dry bar, Self-cleaning oven, Study, Ceiling fan, Private balcony, Refrigerator, Range, Built-in bookshelves, Microwave, Washer and dryer, Granite countertops, Computer niche, Marble countertops, Garden tub, Stainless steel appliances, Private patio, Climate control, Gourmet kitchen, Painted accent walls, Disposal, Walk-in closets, Dishwasher', '*Not all amenities available for every floor plan', 'Community Amenities:', 'Resident app, Stand-alone shower, Deposit free with Rhino, Granite countertops, Swimming pool, Private outdoor living space, Smart home package, Coffee and tea bar, Hardwood floors, Washer and dryer, Tile backsplash, Tile floors in bathroom, Ceiling fan, Pantry, Spin studio, Build credit score with RentTrack, Internet cafe, Quartz counters, Short term leases available, Controlled access, Built-in desk, Furnished apartments available, Resident grilling area, Courtyards w/outdoor fireplaces,
